body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do             Things To Do       In partnership with I?isa?vik College Uqautchim Uglua (Language Nest) public workshops are typically scheduled for the first Saturday of the month at the Iñupiat Heritage Center. Workshops can be anything from skin sewing for booties to butchering a caribou. Workshops are usually based on seasonal activities.
title: Iñupiat Heritage Center: Things To Do
